nodes.text: Real Deal was a Mon Calamari Sailfish-class transport originally provided by Lando Calrissian to Jae Juun. Juun sold the vessel to Squib war profiteers, who used it to supply material to the Killiks during their border conflict with the Chiss. The Real Deal featured an enhanced sensor package that was a hallmark of Calrissian's ship modifications. In sublight pursuit, it could outrun Han Solo's Dray-class transport, the Swiff.
